plot: The movie revolves around a music troop who travel to Singapore for a performance and how their life takes a turn when they meet their love partner.
title: Ninaithale Inikkum
plot_es: The movie revolves around a music troop who travel to Singapore for a performance and how their life takes a turn when they meet their love partner.
